definition: to go and return/to return/to resume/to return to a normal or original state/to repeat/again/to recover/to restore/to turn over/to reply/to answer/to reply to a letter/to retaliate/to carry out
can/to be possible/to be able to/will/to be likely to/to be sure to/to assemble/to meet/to gather/to see/union/group/association/CL:個|个[ge4]/a moment (Taiwan pr. for this sense is [hui3])
anti-Qing revolutionary party set up in 1904 under Cai Yuanpei 蔡元培/same as 復古會|复古会

sentences.english: The two trends of overthrowing Sun Yat-sen were merely a fuse of reorganization Restoration League.
sentences.chinese: 二次“倒孫風潮”不過是光復會重組的導火線而已。

sentences.english: The U.S. Congress returns to work Monday.
sentences.chinese: 美國國會將於星期一復會。

sentences.english: McCormack also said he expected the talks to reconvene “in the next week or two.”
sentences.chinese: 麥科馬克還說，他預計六方會談將在今後一兩週復會。

sentences.english: At the end of July, parliament will break for the summer, not to return until September.
sentences.chinese: 六月底議會要休會度夏直至九月復會。

sentences.english: The Guangfu Association was set up on the basis of the assassinating group of the Junguomin Educational Association.
sentences.chinese: 光復會是在軍國民教育會暗殺團的基礎上組建的。

definition: abbr. for 國家安全局|国家安全局[Guo2 jia1 An1 quan2 ju2]
to play the fool (idiom)/to feign madness
to hold a (business) meeting/to start negotiations
(coll.) to tamper with/to mess around with
to get straight to the point (idiom)
sudden thrust (that catches the opponent off guard)
lit. to settle accounts after autumn/settle scores at an opportune moment (idiom)
